org.springframework.http

接口 ReactiveHttpInputMessage

  • 所有超级接口:
    HttpMessage
    所有已知子接口:
    ClientHttpResponse, ServerHttpRequest
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractServerHttpRequest, ClientHttpResponseDecorator, MockClientHttpResponse, MockServerHttpRequest, ServerHttpRequestDecorator

    public interface ReactiveHttpInputMessage
extends HttpMessage
    An "reactive" HTTP input message that exposes the input as Publisher.

    Typically implemented by an HTTP request on the server-side or a response on the client-side.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      Return the body of the message as a Publisher.
